outputs.output_descr:
The specific objective of the programme is to give police officers the skills necessary:

3.2.1	To understand their role in policing and the protection of the citizen's rights before, during and after the elections and to carry out their role as preservers of peace in the context of heightened tensions during the election period;
3.2.2	To partner, in order to effectively police elections, with the Electoral Commission of Zambia (EZC), civil society organisations and the political parties through the 'community policing' model of policing.
3.2.3	To establish mechanisms and communication strategies between the police and other stakeholders that ensure police officers help to protect the security and integrity of the electoral process, participants, institutions and election outcomes.

project_descr: Election-Related Programme of Support for Training for Law Enforcement Agencies in Zambia 2010 - 2011
